dt: {d_link|landlocked|landlocked} country in central Europe; capital Bratislava {it}area{/it} 18,933 square miles (49,035 square kilometers), {it}population{/it} 5,445,000
Slovakia was a constituent republic of Czechoslovakia from 1918 to 1992.

shortdef: landlocked country in central Europe; capital Bratislava area 18,933 square miles (49,035 square kilometers), population 5,445,000
